name: verified-permissions-authorizer
description: Bridged Go component provider that provisions an AWS Verified Permissions Policy Store and a Lambda Authorizer (runtime fixed to nodejs22.x).

enableDynamoDbStream.description: If true, enable DynamoDB Streams (NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES) on the auth table

isEphemeral.description: If true, treat the deployment stage as ephemeral (destroy resources on stack removal)

lambdaEnvironment.description: Additional environment variables for the Lambda authorizer

TenantTableArn.description: ARN of the DynamoDB auth table

TenantTableStreamArn.description: ARN of the DynamoDB auth table stream (when streams are enabled)
